data.title: The Adventures of Maya the Bee (Illustrated) by Waldemar Bonsels (Ebook)
data.meta_description: Read The Adventures of Maya the Bee (Illustrated) by Waldemar Bonsels with a free trial. Read millions of eBooks and audiobooks on the web, iPad, iPhone and Android.
data.text: Acccording to Wikipedia: "The Adventures of Maya the Bee is a German book ... written by Waldemar Bonsels and published in 1912. The book has been published in many other languages. The stories revolve around a little bee named Maya and her friends Willy the bee, Flip the grasshopper (referred to as "Maja", "Willi" and "Philip" respectively in some versions), Mrs. Cassandra (Maya's teacher), and many other insects and other creatures. The book depicts Maya's development from an adventurous youngster to a responsible adult member of bee society."
